title: Travel List Application
short: A travel packing list manager with local storage functionality
description: A fully functional travel list application built with vanilla JavaScript. Features include adding, editing, deleting items, marking as packed, filtering by status, and persistent storage using localStorage. The app demonstrates CRUD operations and modern JavaScript ES6+ features for organizing travel essentials.
features: Add, edit, and delete items with ease
Mark items as packed with visual feedback
Filter items by all, needed, or packed status
Persistent storage using browser localStorage
Responsive design works on all devices
Clean and intuitive user interface
challenges: The main challenge was implementing efficient localStorage management and ensuring data persistence across browser sessions. I learned about proper data serialization and handling edge cases.

title: Sustainable E-Commerce (Figma Design)
short: Figma prototype for a sustainable e-commerce storefront
description: Figma design for a sustainable e-commerce website focused on eco-friendly products and ethical sourcing. Includes homepage layout, product cards, cart flow, and responsive layouts. Referenced from FIG_Homepage and FIG_HOMEPROD Figma artboards.
features: Homepage hero with sustainable messaging
Product listing and filtering UX
Accessible cart flow and checkout mockups
Responsive layouts for mobile and desktop
Design tokens and component system in Figma
challenges: Designing for sustainability required careful consideration of content hierarchy, eco-focused messaging, and accessible interactions.

title: Portfolio Website
short: Personal portfolio showcasing projects and skills
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Node.js and EJS templating. Features smooth animations, dark/light mode toggle, interactive cursor effects, and a project carousel. The site showcases my web development skills and provides an engaging user experience.
features: Responsive design optimized for all screen sizes
Dark and light mode with smooth transitions
Interactive cursor trail effects
Animated loading screen with progress indicator
Project carousel with keyboard navigation
Contact form with Web3Forms integration
challenges: Creating smooth animations and ensuring performance across different devices required careful optimization. I learned about CSS transforms, requestAnimationFrame, and efficient DOM manipulation.

title: VR Escape Room (Alchemist Lab)
short: Unity VR escape room with interactive puzzles and XR Toolkit
description: A VR escape room experience set in an Alchemist's Lab built with Unity and XR Toolkit. Players wake up in a mysterious basement and must solve three interconnected puzzles involving keys, riddles, counting objects, and tic-tac-toe logic to escape. Features interactive object manipulation, teleportation, and immersive VR mechanics.
features: Three unique puzzle-solving challenges
VR interactions: grabbing, teleporting, and object manipulation
Riddle-based gameplay with hidden clues
Keypad code entry system with logic puzzles
Tic-tac-toe pattern recognition mechanics
20-30 minute immersive gameplay experience
challenges: Designing intuitive VR interactions and balancing puzzle difficulty was challenging. I learned about XR Toolkit implementation, spatial puzzle design, and creating engaging gameplay loops in VR environments.

title: Assignment Tracker
short: Student assignment management system with deadlines and progress tracking
description: A comprehensive assignment tracking application designed for students to manage coursework, deadlines, and submission status. Features task categorization, priority levels, calendar integration, and progress visualization to help students stay organized and meet academic deadlines.
features: Add, edit, and delete assignments with deadlines
Priority levels and status tracking (pending, in progress, completed)
Filter and sort by due date, priority, or subject
Visual progress indicators and completion percentage
Calendar view for upcoming deadlines
Persistent storage with localStorage
challenges: Managing date/time calculations and implementing intuitive deadline reminders required careful planning. I learned about the JavaScript Date API, sorting algorithms, and designing effective notification systems for time-sensitive tasks.

title: Pizza Delivery App
short: Online pizza ordering system with customization and delivery tracking
description: A responsive pizza delivery web application that allows users to browse menu items, customize pizzas, manage shopping cart, and place orders. Built with modern JavaScript, featuring real-time order tracking, custom pizza builder, and seamless checkout experience.
features: Browse pizza menu with detailed descriptions
Custom pizza builder with toppings selection
Shopping cart with add/remove/update quantities
Order summary and checkout process
Responsive design for mobile ordering
Local storage for cart persistence
challenges: Building an intuitive pizza customization interface and managing cart state across sessions required careful planning. I learned about dynamic form handling and optimizing user experience for food ordering workflows.

title: Environmental Impact Tracker Mobile App
short: Track your carbon footprint and environmental impact on the go
description: A mobile application designed to help users monitor and reduce their environmental impact. Features include carbon footprint calculation, daily habit tracking, eco-friendly tips, and visual progress reports. Built as a collaborative team project with a focus on sustainability and user engagement.
features: Track daily activities and their carbon footprint
Visual dashboards showing environmental impact over time
Personalized eco-friendly tips and challenges
Social features to share progress with friends
Category-based impact tracking (transport, food, energy)
Achievement system to encourage sustainable habits
challenges: Collaborating in a team environment and designing an intuitive mobile interface required strong communication and UX planning. I learned about mobile-first design patterns, cross-platform development, and implementing engaging gamification elements.
